name: Karaoke Neighbor
description:
Estell is a Californian delinquent that just got kicked out of her last school. Completely fed up with her behavior, her parents send her off to Japan, her mother's home country. She can't get into any trouble there, right?

Made for NaNoRenO 2018, and because I told fans of my fanfiction that I would make a visual novel based from it. <3

Credits are in the game after all endings (there's...maybe 11 of them?) but I do want to say that all references to Katekyo Hitman Reborn belong to the amazing Amano Akira. Check out her manga; they're really good.
